Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::net::ISSLClientSocketListener::onSSLSocketServerCertFailed ( SSLClientSocket *  socket) [pure virtual]

Called to notify a secure socket that the verification of the server's certificate has failed.

Either of the following decisions can be taken after the verification fails:

  • Continue with SSL handshaking without verification.
  • Close the secure socket.
Parameters:
socketSSLSocket that issue this event.
